page.title: 17Leicester Holiday Fortnight
page.content: In the city of Leicester there is an {industrial fortnights holiday}for the {first two weeks of July.}Most factories close down completely, consequently, as most people are away the schools begin their summer holidays at the beginning of July. During the{July fortnight}the city centre stores hold their{summer sales. The{bus services}into the city centre are very{restricted}as there are so few passengers. The{East coast}is a popular holiday destination for many Leicester people. {Skegness, Hunstanton}and{Mablethorpe} are very popular. At Mablethorpe there is the{Leicester Children's Holiday {Home.}It is a{charity run home}for poor, neglected children of the city. The only charge the children are asked to make for a fortnights holiday is towards transport costs.
